posts.post_content:
Hey all, it's been a while! 

Full disclosure: I soaked this card to remove newspaper from the back.

As you can see, this is a beater beaut. There is a punch hole and then two tiny pin sized holes (ear & collar). 

$145 via PayPal F&F is preferred, but I don't care that much. PayPal normal is fine, if that is what you prefer.

e-mail/paypal: [url]the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com[/url]
